trans-unit.source: Specifies the provider for data encryption. For information about data encryption, see "Encrypting databases on disk" in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph></cite>.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the provider for data encryption.
For information about data encryption, see "Encrypting databases on disk" in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph></cite>.

target.mrk: Specifies the provider for data encryption.
For information about data encryption, see "Encrypting databases on disk" in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph></cite>.

trans-unit.source: If this attribute is not specified, the default encryption provider is the one included in the JVM that you are using.

seg-source.mrk: If this attribute is not specified, the default encryption provider is the one included in the JVM that you are using.

target.mrk: If this attribute is not specified, the default encryption provider is the one included in the JVM that you are using.

trans-unit.source: The encryptionProvider=providerName attribute must be combined with the dataEncryption=true attribute and with either the bootPassword=key or the encryptionKey=key attribute. You can also use the encryptionAlgorithm=algorithm attribute to specify the encryption algorithm.

seg-source.mrk: The encryptionProvider=providerName attribute must be combined with the dataEncryption=true attribute and with either the bootPassword=key or the encryptionKey=key attribute.
You can also use the encryptionAlgorithm=algorithm attribute to specify the encryption algorithm.

target.mrk: The encryptionProvider=providerName attribute must be combined with the dataEncryption=true attribute and with either the bootPassword=key or the encryptionKey=key attribute.
You can also use the encryptionAlgorithm=algorithm attribute to specify the encryption algorithm.

trans-unit.source: For an existing, unencrypted database for which authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> can perform encryption or reencryption. Please see "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: For an existing, unencrypted database for which authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> can perform encryption or reencryption.
Please see "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.

target.mrk: For an existing, unencrypted database for which authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> can perform encryption or reencryption.
Please see "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.

trans-unit.source: -- create a new, encrypted database jdbc:derby:encryptedDB;create=true;dataEncryption=true; encryptionProvider=com.sun.crypto.provider.SunJCE; encryptionAlgorithm=DESede/CBC/NoPadding; bootPassword=cLo4u922sc23aPe -- configure an existing database for encryption jdbc:derby:salesdb;dataEncryption=true; encryptionProvider=com.sun.crypto.provider.SunJCE; encryptionAlgorithm=DESede/CBC/NoPadding; bootPassword=cLo4u922sc23aPe

seg-source.mrk: -- create a new, encrypted database jdbc:derby:encryptedDB;create=true;dataEncryption=true; encryptionProvider=com.sun.crypto.provider.SunJCE; encryptionAlgorithm=DESede/CBC/NoPadding; bootPassword=cLo4u922sc23aPe -- configure an existing database for encryption jdbc:derby:salesdb;dataEncryption=true; encryptionProvider=com.sun.crypto.provider.SunJCE; encryptionAlgorithm=DESede/CBC/NoPadding; bootPassword=cLo4u922sc23aPe

target.mrk: -- create a new, encrypted database jdbc:derby:encryptedDB;create=true;dataEncryption=true; encryptionProvider=com.sun.crypto.provider.SunJCE; encryptionAlgorithm=DESede/CBC/NoPadding; bootPassword=cLo4u922sc23aPe -- configure an existing database for encryption jdbc:derby:salesdb;dataEncryption=true; encryptionProvider=com.sun.crypto.provider.SunJCE; encryptionAlgorithm=DESede/CBC/NoPadding; bootPassword=cLo4u922sc23aPe
